name: Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee
desc: Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee, situated in Roorkee, Uttarakhand, is one of the premier technical institutes in India. Renowned for its academic excellence and research contributions, it offers a diverse range of programs in engineering, science, and technology.

name: Banaras Hindu University
desc: Banaras Hindu University, located in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, is one of the oldest and largest residential universities in Asia. With a rich academic tradition and modern infrastructure, it offers a wide range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs across various disciplines.

name: Punjab Agricultural University
desc: Punjab Agricultural University, situated in Ludhiana, Punjab, is a leading agricultural university known for its research and extension programs. With a focus on agricultural innovation and technology transfer, it plays a vital role in promoting sustainable agriculture and rural development.

name: Mizoram University
desc: Mizoram University, located in Aizawl, Mizoram, is a central university established to cater to the higher education needs of the state. With a commitment to academic excellence and regional development, it offers a diverse range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs.

name: Tamil Nadu Agricultural University
desc: Tamil Nadu Agricultural University, situated in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, is a premier institution for agricultural education and research in India. With a focus on technology-driven agriculture and sustainable practices, it plays a crucial role in transforming the agricultural landscape of the region.
